00053 class OPENMM_EXPORT State {
00054 public:
00059     enum DataType {Positions=1, Velocities=2, Forces=4, Energy=8, Parameters=16};
00063     State();
00067     double getTime() const;
00071     const std::vector<Vec3>& getPositions() const;
00075     const std::vector<Vec3>& getVelocities() const;
00079     const std::vector<Vec3>& getForces() const;
00083     double getKineticEnergy() const;
00087     double getPotentialEnergy() const;
00095     void getPeriodicBoxVectors(Vec3& a, Vec3& b, Vec3& c) const;
00099     const std::map<std::string, double>& getParameters() const;
00100 private:
00101     friend class Context;
00102     State(double time, int numParticles, int types);
00103     std::vector<Vec3>& updPositions();
00104     std::vector<Vec3>& updVelocities();
00105     std::vector<Vec3>& updForces();
00106     std::map<std::string, double>& updParameters();
00107     void setEnergy(double ke, double pe);
00108     void setPeriodicBoxVectors(const Vec3& a, const Vec3& b, const Vec3& c);
00109     int types;
00110     double time, ke, pe;
00111     std::vector<Vec3> positions;
00112     std::vector<Vec3> velocities;
00113     std::vector<Vec3> forces;
00114     Vec3 periodicBoxVectors[3];
00115     std::map<std::string, double> parameters;
